name: Lines (itch) (Bergros Gigja)
description:
Use the arrow keys to get to the other dot without touching the lines.

Sound effects: https://freesound.org/people/pinto0lucas/sounds/422811
Background music:  https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/sci-fi

Made for the course Advanced Game Design & Development, Reykjavík University
